en.msgWarningTerminalDisable:
When you deactivate the terminal, it will stop synchronizing with Visualtime.
If it is still in use, it will continue to record punches, but they will not be downloaded to Visualtime.
You can reactivate it later and it will be operational again, downloading pending clockings if any and updating your schedule.
en.roCancelDesc: Cancel the dialog and continue working
en.roErrorCloseDesc: Close the dialogue and continue working
en.roInvalidDatePeriod: The selected date range is incorrect
en.roNoFilesSelected: You have not selected any files to import
en.roPeriodAlreadyExported: The period has already been exported
en.roProcessOk: The selected signings will be attempted to be processed shortly.
en.roProfileCorrupted: The layout of the analytics columns could not be loaded because one of the filters originally included is no longer valid. We are displaying the default dataset. Please configure the template again and save it.
